meanings.definition: To apply makeup to one's face.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys farding before going out with her friends.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, she spends time farding in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent3: While farding, she accidentally dropped her lipstick.
meanings.sent4: Her farding transformed her look from plain to glamorous.
meanings.sent5: The art of farding can make a big difference in how one feels.

meanings.definition: The act of putting on cosmetics.
meanings.sent1: Her farding routine includes various beauty products.
meanings.sent2: She learned about different techniques for effective farding.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor's exaggerated farding made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The farding of the models at the fashion show was impeccable.
meanings.sent5: Proper farding can enhance one's features and boost confidence.

meanings.definition: The process of enhancing one's appearance with cosmetics.
meanings.sent1: Her farding skills have improved over time.
meanings.sent2: Farding can be a fun and creative way to express oneself.
meanings.sent3: The clown's colorful farding made the children smile.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the villain's dark farding added to his menacing look.
meanings.sent5: Effective farding requires the right tools and products.
